ability.Parental Bond: This Pokemon's damaging moves hit twice. The second hit has its damage quartered.

Double-Edge.effect: If the target lost HP, the user takes recoil damage equal to 33% the HP lost by the target.

Fire Punch.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.

Earthquake.effect: Damage doubles if the target is using Dig.

Rock Slide.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Power-Up Punch.effect: Has a 100% chance to raise the user's Attack by 1 stage.
